author: Danko8321
name: Whiteshuffle
description:
Well, this is my second Cinnamon theme and I'm getting to like this business :D

Anyway, this is a light version of my other theme (well, kind of) and is based mostly in the old Mint-X theme from Gnome 2; I try in no way to replicate it or anything like it, I was just feeling specially nostalgic this days and decided to do something about it; I hope you fellas like it :)

Changelog:

Version 1.0:


-Fixed applet spacing.

-Fixed applet hover effect

-Changed applet color so hover effect is visible.

-Fixed Window list color so windows can be diferenciated.

-Fixed Window list spacing to have more space in panel.

-Fixed Polkit dialog entry.

-Fixed Logout session dialog to enhance visibility and have a better feel.

-Added support for OnScreen Keyboard and fixed visibility issues.

-Fixed calendar day effect.

-Fixed sound applet size and color.

-And a lot other things I can't remember right now.

Version 0.5:

This version is currently an RC, but is very usable and ready for day-to-day testing; nonetheless, use it at your own risk and, if you can, help improve it by sending requests ;). Cheers and good luck. Danko.
